review: 12+ hours left on the deal for this Fire TV Stick for $24.00 and the wait list is full.  BUT...you can still purchase it for $39.00.  What a bunch of crock!
author: Andrea Donahue

review: Seems like this would be nice, but it's tough for those of us on the West Coast, since the Prime deal is sold out by the time we can get to it.  Amazon either needs to offer more of them, or stagger the hours of the offer to allow us a fair chance at the deal.  It's note even 10 am in Alaska.  Feels like "bait and switch".
author: Ken

review: It is not allowing me to see any movies. It is stuck in the downloading mode.Frustration.JR
author: John Ruane

review: Instead of cable we use this! Was easy to hook up just take out of the box and plug in!
author: Laura

review: Works great. Fast setup for this novice
author: Judy

review: This Fire Stick is amazing. A must get. So intuitive.
author: Jazzman

review: It works great but I was disappointed there were not more free selections
author: Joyce B Dorval
